Topic.Title: Obama: Higher Taxes, More Spending, No Debt Limit, No Compromises

Message.Msg: Regardless of what either side is offering... Obama has stated that his demand that congress relinquish their power to raise the debt ceiling is non-negotiable. As long as Obama demands that Congress give up such a checks-and-balances power, the talks will go nowhere. The republicans are no more likely to allow that than the democrats would have 5 or 6 years ago if Bush would have been enough of an idiot to propose something like that. THAT is what is holding these negotiations hostage... power-grab demands by Obama that essentially stone-wall EVERYTHING. As I've said, Obama is the polar opposite of Bill Clinton, who was an excellent president and bargained productively in good faith with congress... ... whereas Obama is proving over and over that he can't lead and can't govern... he's absolutely the WORST president of the modern era. Spok
